Package com.avanza.astrix.beans.service

Contains the core representations and implementation of service beans in Astrix.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AstrixServiceBeanInstanceMBean  
    BoundServiceBeanInstance<T>  
    ServiceBeanProxyFactory  
    ServiceComponent
    Used on the client side to bind to service exported over the service-registry.
    ServiceComponentRegistry  
    ServiceDiscovery
    Strategy for discovering the ServiceProperties associated with a given Astrix service bean instance.
    ServiceDiscoveryFactoryPlugin<T>  
    ServiceDiscoveryMetaFactory  
    ServiceMetaFactory  
    StatefulAstrixBean
